English as a Second Language - ESL
Columbus Board of Education to Hold Virtual Meeting on Tuesday, April 21

div.p: The Columbus Board of Education will hold its regular business meeting virtually on Tuesday, April 21, using online video conferencing tools in accordance with the guidelines in H.B. 197.

a.title: Go to comments for Columbus Board of Education to Hold Virtual Meeting on Tuesday, April 21

a.span: West HS Student Who Walked Daily To Library For Homework Help Gets Accepted to 12 Colleges

div.p: Lashawn Samuel walked three miles per day to get homework help, and his hard work has paid off.

a.title: Go to comments for West HS Student Who Walked Daily To Library For Homework Help Gets Accepted to 12 Colleges

div.p: Full archive of the CCS FAC meeting, held virtually, on April 15, 2020

a.title: Go to comments for Virtual FAC Meeting: April 15, 2020

a.span: CCS Officials To Hold Virtual Town Hall With Columbus President Pro Tem Elizabeth Brown

div.p: Dr. Talisa Dixon, Alesia Gillison to join Elizabeth Brown in live-streamed event.

a.title: Go to comments for CCS Officials To Hold Virtual Town Hall With Columbus President Pro Tem Elizabeth Brown

a.span: Chromebook Computer Distribution and Repairs Update

div.p: Columbus City Schools families who are in need of a Chromebook can make an appointment to get a computer at Central Enrollment.

a.title: Go to comments for Chromebook Computer Distribution and Repairs Update

a.span: WATCH: CCS Academic Chiefs Present District's Virtual Learning Plan

div.p: Chief Academic Officer, Dr. Tracy Ocasio, and Chief of Transformation and Leadership, Dr. Angela Chapman, present the new Columbus City Schools virtual learning plan.

a.title: Go to comments for WATCH: CCS Academic Chiefs Present District's Virtual Learning Plan

a.span: Board of Education Meeting Highlight: Dr. Dixon On Curriculum

div.p: CCS Superintendent Dr. Talisa Dixon addresses her expectations for the districts new online learning plan during Tuesdays Board of Education meeting.

a.title: Go to comments for Board of Education Meeting Highlight: Dr. Dixon On Curriculum

a.span: Board of Education Meeting Highlight: Virtual Enrollment

div.p: Chief of Accountability Officer, Dr. Machelle Kline, provides an overview of Central Enrollments new normal and what Central Enrollment Specialists are doing to process appointments and to get families enrolled for the 2019-2020 and 2020-2021 school years.

a.title: Go to comments for Board of Education Meeting Highlight: Virtual Enrollment

a.span: Board of Education Meeting Highlight: Food Service

div.p: The Districts Director of Food Services, Joe Brown, provides an overview of the 15 decentralized meal service sites district-wide.

a.title: Go to comments for Board of Education Meeting Highlight: Food Service

a.span: Board of Education Meeting Highlight: Engagement

div.p: Chief of Engagement Alesia Gillison provides an overview of the departments Family Needs Survey, a new Partnership in Action Team, and what you can do if you need support at home.

a.title: Go to comments for Board of Education Meeting Highlight: Engagement

a.span: Board of Education, Dr. Dixon Share "Thank You" Message With Columbus Community

div.p: The Columbus Board of Education and Superintendent Dr. Talisa Dixon share a message of thanks with the Columbus community.

a.title: Go to comments for Board of Education, Dr. Dixon Share "Thank You" Message With Columbus Community

a.span: Columbus City Schools Earns Champion Recognition In AEP Energy Efficiency Awards

div.p: Columbus City Schools, under Jeff Roe, Energy Management Supervisor, is a recipient of AEP Ohios 2020 Energy Efficiency Champion award.

a.title: Go to comments for Columbus City Schools Earns Champion Recognition In AEP Energy Efficiency Awards

span.a: Board of Education Milliage Committee Virtual Meeting

span.p: Please bookmark and regularly check Stay Safe CCS for all information regarded to the COVID-19 pandemic and District planning and programming.

a.title: Go to comments for Stay Safe CCS
